arts.ttl: Bo Henriksen pleased with Mainz’s character in historic victory against Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Mainz redeemed their DFB Pokal loss to Bayern in front of their home crowd with a big win that will boost confidence before travelling to Frankfurt for their final game of the year. We were simply there and that’s important when you play against Bayern Munich, one of the best teams in the world.

arts.ttl: Most of Bayern Munich’s walking wounded have timelines for return
arts.sum: • Serge Gnabry: out with knee problems - expected back after the international break (Gladbach) • Hiroki Itō: there’s currently little information available about his injury and recovery.

arts.ttl: Thomas Müller says Bayern Munich were "not bad" in 2-1 defeat to Mainz 05
arts.sum: Müller is right to some extent — Bayern simply needs to do more next game. Bayern Munich recorded their first Bundesliga loss of the season as they fell 2-1 to Mainz 05 in what was frankly a highly disappointing performance.

arts.ttl: Max Eberl refuses to blame injuries for Mainz 05’s “deserved” win over Bayern Munich
arts.sum: “We had enough quality on the pitch to win the game, but we didn’t. Looking for more thoughts and analysis of Bayern Munich’s stunning 2-1 loss to Mainz 05 in the Bundesliga?

arts.ttl: Henriksen on sensational Mainz win: "If you only defend against Bayern, you will die a slow death"
arts.sum: Bo Henriksen believes Mainz found the right balance between defending solidly and attacking with confidence in Saturday's 2-1 win over Bayern Munich.

arts.ttl: Kompany on Bayern's defeat to Mainz: "We weren't at our best"
arts.sum: Vincent Kompany admitted that Bayern Munich were not at their best in Saturday's defeat to Mainz.

arts.ttl: Four Observations from Bayern Munich’s dejecting 2-1 defeat against FSV Mainz 05
arts.sum: Bundesliga matchday 14 saw Bayern Munich ’s first defeat of the season going down against FSV Mainz 05. The lad looks promising and is a good fit for the way Mainz are playing under Henriksen.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works: Postgame Show — Mainz 05 2-1 Bayern Munich (Bundesliga)
arts.sum: Be sure to stay tuned to Bavarian Podcast Works for all of your up to date coverage on Bayern Munich and Germany. Let’s talk about how it all went down and more on the Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show.

arts.ttl: ‘Not going to’: £40m player is more likely to join Liverpool than Bayern Munich – journalist
arts.sum: Liverpool may need to be in the market for a new right-back soon. Indeed, Trent Alexander-Arnold is in the final year of his Liverpool contract,...

arts.ttl: Match Awards from Bayern Munich’s dismal 2-1 defeat to Mainz
arts.sum: Boey also helped Bayern largely neutralize the offense of Mainz, which had regularly threatened the Bavarians and scored 2 goals before he had entered the field. Paul Nebel’s running and hard work off the ball might not have caught the eye but was every bit as important to the team’s victory as the offense was; despite being labeled as more of a technical player, he more than holds his own when it comes to defensive contributions.
